heading: HR02210
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE POLICY OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES BOARD OF REGENTS LIMITING THE COMMUTATION OF FACULTY SICK LEAVE BENEFITS ONLY TO "SERIOUS OR SEVERE ILLNESSES" IN CASES OF OPTIONAL RETIREMENT
principal-authors: TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02210
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE POLICY OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES BOARD OF REGENTS LIMITING THE COMMUTATION OF FACULTY SICK LEAVE BENEFITS ONLY TO "SERIOUS OR SEVERE ILLNESSES" IN CASES OF OPTIONAL RETIREMENT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
